languages.text: "И все же вы отвечаете за деяния своих людей. Назовите хоть одну причину не казнить вас на месте".

traits.locale_text: "И все же вы отвечаете за деяния своих людей. Назовите хоть одну причину не казнить вас на месте".

languages.text: "Be that as it may, you are responsible for the actions of your people. Give me one good reason not to execute you on the spot."
languages.original_text: "И все же вы отвечаете за деяния своих людей. Назовите хоть одну причину не казнить вас на месте".

traits.locale_text: "And yet you are responsible for the actions of your people. Give me one good reason not to execute you on the spot."
"And yet you are responsible for the actions of your people. Give me one good reason not to execute you on the spot."
"Be that as it may, you are responsible for the actions of your people. Give me one good reason not to execute you on the spot."
"Be that as it may, you are responsible for the actions of your people. Give me one good reason not to execute you on the spot."
"Be that as it may, you are responsible for the actions of your people. Give me one good reason not to execute you on the spot."

languages.text: “即便如此，你依然要为你的人犯下的罪行负责。给我个充分的理由，否则我就要将你当场处决。”
languages.original_text: "Be that as it may, you are responsible for the actions of your people. Give me one good reason not to execute you on the spot."

traits.locale_text: “即便如此，你依然要为你的人犯下的罪行负责。给我个充分的理由，否则我就要将你当场处决。”

languages.text: «Sea como fuere, es responsable de las acciones de su gente. Deme un buen motivo para no ejecutarle en el acto».
languages.original_text: "Be that as it may, you are responsible for the actions of your people. Give me one good reason not to execute you on the spot."

traits.locale_text: «Sea como fuere, es responsable de las acciones de su gente. Deme un buen motivo para no ejecutarle en el acto».

languages.text: 「それはさておき、お前は部下の行動に責任がある。この場で処刑しない正当な理由を述べてもらおう」
languages.original_text: "Be that as it may, you are responsible for the actions of your people. Give me one good reason not to execute you on the spot."

traits.locale_text: 「それはさておき、お前は部下の行動に責任がある。この場で処刑しない正当な理由を述べてもらおう」

languages.text: "Wie dem auch sei, Ihr tragt die Verantwortung für das Handeln Eurer Leute. Nennt mir einen guten Grund, Euch nicht jetzt und hier hinzurichten."
languages.original_text: "Be that as it may, you are responsible for the actions of your people. Give me one good reason not to execute you on the spot."

traits.locale_text: "Wie dem auch sei, Ihr tragt die Verantwortung für das Handeln Eurer Leute. Nennt mir einen guten Grund, Euch nicht jetzt und hier hinzurichten."

languages.text: « Quoiqu'il en soit, vous êtes responsable de vos gens. Donnez-moi une bonne raison de ne pas vous exécuter sur-le-champ. »
languages.original_text: "Be that as it may, you are responsible for the actions of your people. Give me one good reason not to execute you on the spot."

traits.locale_text: « Quoiqu'il en soit, vous êtes responsable de vos gens. Donnez-moi une bonne raison de ne pas vous exécuter sur-le-champ. »

languages.text: "Öyle bile olsa adamlarının eylemlerinden sen sorumlusun. Seni şu an idam etmemem için geçerli bir sebep söyle."
languages.original_text: "Be that as it may, you are responsible for the actions of your people. Give me one good reason not to execute you on the spot."

traits.locale_text: "Öyle bile olsa adamlarının eylemlerinden sen sorumlusun. Seni şu an idam etmemem için bana iyi bir gerekçe göster."
